name: Expanded Enhance Arrows
text: Your magical arrows produce a wider range of powers.
benefit: You add corrosive to the list of special properties you can grant your nonmagical arrows with your enhance arrows ability at 3rd level. At 5th level, you can add the ghost touch, limning, or planar special ability instead of distance. At 7th level, you can add the corrosive burst special ability.
text_zh: 你的魔法箭矢现在能产生更多样的能力了。
benefit_zh: 3级时，将酸蚀（corrosive）UE加入附魔箭可赋予非魔法箭矢的特性列表中。5级时，你可以在箭矢上附加幽冥、妖火（limning）UE或位面（planar）UE，取代原本的及远。7级时，你可以把酸爆（corrosive burst）UE特殊能力加入列表中。
